info.summary:
Matthias C. M. Troffaes works as a lecturer in statistics at the Department of Mathematical Sciences, Durham University, and his\her h-index is 7, g-index is 13. His\Her interests are :
 Imprecise Probabilit...; Lower Prevision; Choice Function; Choquet Integral; Dynamic Programming;
